page.description: The A5_DELETE_USER() function allows the administrator to delete a user account
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_delete_user(C master_password ,C user_name )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The user was deleted. .F. = The user was not deleted.

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

argument.name: user_name
argument.description: The name of the user to be deleted.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example attempts to delete a nonexistent user.
